column1: Smoque BBQ////09/22/21 - My wife's 2 friends have been visiting Chicago
column2: one from Orlando & the udder one from Los Angeles.  She knows both of dem when Dey was yuts in da Philippines.  Visiting Chicago it's been obligatory to take them to the some of the places wit da foods dat make Shecawgo famous.  Places like Lou Malnati's Pizza
column4: Da Shecawgo hot dog w & of course Smoque for BBQ.
